H3.text: In 2012 which former Liberian president was found guilty of crimes against humanity. Chuck Taylor

A4.text: He was found guilty in April 2012 of all eleven charges levied by the Special Court, including terror, murder and rape.

A5.text: In May 2012, Taylor was sentenced to 50 years in prison.
